definitions.definition: A person who inquires , especially searchingly or ruthlessly .
examples: During the meeting, Jake turned into an inquisitor , firing questions at the presenter non-stop.

definitions.definition: An official of the ecclesiastical court of the Inquisition .

main_definition: A person who inquires , especially searchingly or ruthlessly .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) An official of the ecclesiastical court of the Inquisition .
